required-server: You need an upload server listening at {{- url}} to receive the files...
intro: Upload multiple files with the file dialog or by dragging and dropping images onto the dashed region.

file-source.no-usable-files-in-zip: ZIP file does not contain any usable files
file-source.no-usable-files-hint: Upload a ZIP file with file type(s) of
file-source.mime-type-body: The file format is not supported by this application.
file-source.too-big-file-body: The file can have a maximum of {{size}}.

file-sink.upload-success-body: You have successfully uploaded {{count}} file to {{name}}.
file-sink.upload-success-body_plural: You have successfully uploaded {{count}} files to {{name}}.

nextcloud-file-picker.auth-info: A new page will open to connect your account.
nextcloud-file-picker.no-data: No data available in this folder.
nextcloud-file-picker.no-data-type: No data available in this folder.
nextcloud-file-picker.no-favorites: No favorites of the relevant type were found. Define files and folders as favorites in your {{name}} to display them here
nextcloud-file-picker.no-recent-files: No relevant files and folders were found within the last 3 months.
nextcloud-file-picker.add-folder-error: The resource "{{folder}}" you tried to create already exists.
nextcloud-file-picker.add-folder-error-empty: The folder name can not be empty.
nextcloud-file-picker.replace-title-1: There is already a file with the name
nextcloud-file-picker.replace-text: What do you want to do
nextcloud-file-picker.replace-mode-all: Do this for the next conflicts
nextcloud-file-picker.readonly: You are not allowed to uploade files in this directory.
nextcloud-file-picker.onlycreate: You are only allowed to create new files in this directory.
nextcloud-file-picker.onlyedit: You are only allowed to edit files in this directory.
nextcloud-file-picker.error-save-to-favorites: Saving to Favorites not possible! Please select a folder within the Favorites.
nextcloud-file-picker.error-save-to-recent: Saving to Recent Files not possible! Please select a folder within the Recent Files.

clipboard.remove-all: Remove all files from the clipboard
clipboard.save-all: Save all files from the clipboard
clipboard.save-count: Save one file from the clipboard
clipboard.saved-files-body: A file was successfully stored temporarily in the clipboard and can now be used within this application.
clipboard.saved-files-body_plural: {{count}} files were successfully stored temporarily in the clipboard and can now be used within this application.
clipboard.clear-count-clipboard-body: One file was successfully removed from clipboard.
clipboard.clear-count-clipboard-body_plural: {{count}} files were successfully removed from clipboard.
clipboard.file-warning-body: There is still a file on the clipboard. The clipboard is discarded when you exit the page.
clipboard.file-warning-body_plural: There are still {{count}} files on the clipboard. The clipboard is discarded when you exit the page.
clipboard.upload-area-text: In this area you can upload documents up to a size of 32MB via Drag & Drop or by selecting them directly.
clipboard.warning: Attention! If you close the browser or reload the page the existing clipboard is automatically discarded!
